'''Farewell, Friend''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[Saurian Indwelling|indwell a Saurian]], then have that Saurian perish. The easiest way to complete this achievement, is by indwelling a [[Yumkasaurus]] or [[Tepetlisaurus]], then jumping into a deep pool of [[water]] or [[Liquid Phlogiston]].
